description: This file contains the CSS styles for the theme management and layout of the Tic Tac Toe frontend application. It defines variables for light and dark themes, styles for the main application components, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class which provides the overall layout styles and theme management.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Class used for the logo with defined dimensions and animation properties.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header class for the App, including layout and background styles.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Class for links within the App with transition effects on color.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button class for toggling between light and dark themes with styling for responsiveness and hover effects.

methods.name: App-logo-spin
methods.description: Keyframes for the spinning animation of the App logo.
